content: I think I'll definitely consider hotels with kitchenettes or kitchens, especially since we'll be traveling with kids. It'll be great to have the flexibility to prepare some meals and snacks in the room. By the way, I remember when I was in New York City in early March, I stayed at a hotel in Midtown that had a small kitchenette, and it was really convenient for me to grab a quick breakfast or snack.
